name: OUTCAST - Team 21
description:
PITCH

Have you ever wondered what it feels like to be different ?

Take control of an outcast, a tetrahedron in a land of cubes.

Try to navigate your way in this world built for everyone but you, and feel the pressure of not being able to fit in.

HOW TO PLAY ?

You control a tetrahedron with your controller or keyboard. As you can imagine, moving it around is fairly difficult, so the goal of this game is simple:

Try to make your way to the end of the level.

But the cubes around you are not so friendly, and your presence in their world is not so welcome.

CONTROLS
